string-array.name: Fortune_Array
string-array.item: Help! I am trapped in a fortune cookie factory!
Be on the lookout for coming events; they cast their shadow beforehand.
It is now and in this world that we must live.
You will be called in to fulfill a position of high honor and responsibility.
Joys are often shadows cast by sorrows.
Accept your past without regrets. Handle your present with confidence. Face your future without fear.
The only certainty is that nothing is certain.
I think you ate your fortune while you were eating your cookie.
I am a fortune, you just broke my little house. Where will I live now?
The race is not always to the swift but to those that keep running.
Today is the tomorrow that you worried so much about yesterday.
Rest is a good thing, but boredom is its brother.
Before you wonder "Am I doing things right?", ask "Am I doing the right things?"
Great fortune is in your future.
A life without love is a bird without wings.
A thrilling adventure awaits you. Will you be ready for it?
